long_description: Packed with ideas to transform your culinary adventures at your campsite,. Authors: Christine and Tim Connors. Softcover; 245 pages; black-and-white photographs. The Globe Pequot Press; copyright 2013. Book is filled with recipes with at-home preparation directions, campside cooking instructions, nutritional information, serving details, and weight of packable ingredients. .
short_description: Packed with ideas to transform your culinary adventures at your campsite, Lipsmackin' Car Campin'' offers hundreds of tasty recipes and everything you need to know to prep them.
